EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Whats New 8.4.1 - EMEA/US (excluding DACH) - 2015.08.13.Email - Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis is launching a new Service Pack for Tosca Testsuite 8.4! We are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all the cool new features in our upcoming ‘What’s New’ Webinar. Join us as our VP of Project Management, Gerd Weishaar, and Roman Zednik, Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting, introduce and demonstrate many new features, including the:
- Re-scan UI Modules - Mobile+: New Scan - Mobile Web Apps: Responsive Design Tests - Orchestrated Service Virtualization Recorder - And much more!
Our What’s New in Tosca Testsuite 8.4.1 webinar will take place on Aug. 13, 2015 starting at 4:00pm CEST. We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/what-is-new-8-4-1-20150813-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/what-is-new-8-4-1-20150813-webinar?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu, Aug 13, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Gerd Weishaar VP Product Management Tricentis
Roman Zednik Worldwide Director for Pre-Sales Consulting Tricentis
